sections.heading: of application and construction

76-3808.Uniformity of application and construction.

In applying and construing the Uniform Unlawful Restrictions in Land Records Act, a court shall consider the promotion of uniformity of the law among jurisdictions that enact it.

SourceLaws 2025, LB21, ยง 8.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
